com.viaoa.jfc

Class OATextFieldLookup

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.text.JTextComponent
            • javax.swing.JTextField
              • com.viaoa.jfc.OATextField
                • com.viaoa.jfc.OATextFieldLookup
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    OAJfcComponent, OATableComponent, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.Scrollable, javax.swing.SwingConstants

    public class OATextFieldLookup
extends OATextField
    Used for binding a JTextField component to perform a select on a Hub. The query will be based on the property name and the value entered. Users can use specified wildcard (default "*") character that is used with the "LIKE" operator.

    Example:
    This will create a JTextField that will automatically select Employees with the LastName property matching the value entered. 

        Hub hubEmployee = new Hub(Employee.class);
    JTextField txt = new JTextField(30);
    Hub2TextFieldLookup tfl = new Hub2TextFieldLookup(hubEmployee, txt, "LastName");
    tfl.setWildCard("*");   // will be converted to '%' and used with LIKE operator

    For more information about this package, see documentation.

    See Also:
    OATextFieldLookup, Serialized Form

    • Method Detail

      • setWildCard

        public void setWildCard(java.lang.String wildCard)
        Set any characters that need to be treated as wildcard chars. They will be converted to the SQL '%' wildcard. Default is "*"

      • getWildCard

        public java.lang.String getWildCard()
        Set any characters that need to be treated as wildcard chars. They will be converted to the SQL '%' wildcard. Default is "*"

      • setShowActiveObject

        public void setShowActiveObject(boolean b)
        Display the property value of the active object. If false, then the search text that was entered is always displayed. Default is true

        Display the property value of the active object. If false, then the search text that was entered is always displayed. Default is true
